languages.text: "Я молю Бога-Императора, чтобы Адептус Арбитес оттеснили врага и успели помочь другим частям улья".
"I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."
languages.original_text: "Я молю Бога-Императора, чтобы Адептус Арбитес оттеснили врага и успели помочь другим частям улья".

traits.locale_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."
"I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."
"I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."
"I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."
"I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."
"I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

languages.text: “我向神皇祈祷，祈求法务部能击退敌人，抽出时间援救巢都其他区域。”
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

traits.locale_text: “我向神皇祈祷，祈求法务部能击退敌人，抽出时间援救巢都其他区域。”

languages.text: «Rezo al Dios Emperador para que el Adeptus Arbites rechace al enemigo y tenga tiempo de ayudar a las otras zonas de la colmena».
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

traits.locale_text: «Rezo al Dios Emperador para que el Adeptus Arbites rechace al enemigo y tenga tiempo de ayudar a las otras zonas de la colmena».

languages.text: « Je prie l'Empereur-Dieu que l'Adeptus Arbites parvienne à repousser l'ennemi et trouve le temps d'aider le reste de la ruche. »
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

traits.locale_text: « Je prie l'Empereur-Dieu que l'Adeptus Arbites parvienne à repousser l'ennemi et trouve le temps d'aider le reste de la ruche. »

languages.text: 「敵を撃退し、他のハイヴ区域を援護する時間が高等裁定局に与えられるよう、神帝陛下にお祈りしています」
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

traits.locale_text: 「敵を撃退し、他のハイヴ区域を援護する時間が高等裁定局に与えられるよう、神帝陛下にお祈りしています」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites düşmanlarını püskürtsün de kovanın diğer kısımlarına yardım etmeye vakti kalsın diye Tanrı İmparator'a dua ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites düşmanlarını püskürtsün de kovanın diğer kısımlarına yardım etmeye vakti kalsın diye Tanrı İmparator'a dua ediyorum."

languages.text: "Ich bete zum Gottimperator, dass die Adeptus Arbites den Feind zurückschlagen und Zeit genug haben, die anderen Bereiche der Makropole zu unterstützen."
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that the Adeptus Arbites will repel the enemy and have time to aid the other parts of the hive."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bete zum Gottimperator, dass die Adeptus Arbites den Feind zurückschlagen und Zeit genug haben, die anderen Bereiche der Makropole zu unterstützen."
